verses.roman:
acyutera yei mata, sei mata sāra
āra yata mata saba haila chārakhāra

synonyms: acyutera—of Acyutānanda; yei—which; mata—direction; sei—that; mata—direction; sāra—essential; āra—other; yata—all; mata—directions; saba—all; haila—became; chārakhāra—dismantled.
translation: It should be concluded, therefore, that the path of Acyutānanda is the essence of spiritual life. Those who did not follow this path simply scattered.
